PLClub Discussion Group

Verifying Neural Networks with Reluplex
Oct 4 2019
Steve Hsu

Neural networks are being used in safety-critical applications. In this setting, we want guarantees about the behavior of these neural networks. I will talk about a tool called Reluplex, which verifies properties of neural networks. It can perform this verification when the neural network uses the ReLU as the activation function of its neurons and the property is stated in terms of piecewise linear constraints on the input and output values of the network.

Here is a link to Guy Katzâ€™s website, which has a brief description of Reluplex. https://www.katz-lab.com/research
